#Installation Instructions.

1. Download the current version of the zenphotoiphone theme from the [http://code.google.com/p/zenphotoiphone/downloads/list Download Page].

2. Extract the contents to your themes directory. This is found under `/zenphoto/themes/`.

3. Configure the functions.php to automatically redirect: [http://code.google.com/p/zenphotoiphone/wiki/Redirect  Instructions].
